title: The Dumbest Smartphone?! - Durability Test!
description: Sometimes people yearn for the simple life. And that simple life... can be expensive. This 'Light Phone 2' is a very expensive $300 minimalist smartphone. The Light Phone 2 is dumbed down to just handle the basics. Texting, calling, but can still be a hotspot for a laptop or 2nd device if needed. Making this the dumbest smartphone weve tested so far. Or is it the smartest dumb phone... who knows. You can check out the light phone yourself here:  This video is obviously not sponsored.   If you've made it this far into the description, check out my new knife. I wont be selling it officially for a few more days, but here is a sneak peak:   *Follow me for updates!* Instagram:  Facebook:  Twitter:   LARGE tool kit:  Travel Tool Kit:  Green Pry tool:  Metal phone opening tool:  Replacement phone parts:   The camera I used to film this video:  The Lens I used for this video:  Wide angle lens:  And this Metabones adapter:  This is the drone I use:   TO SEND ME STUFF: See my P.O.
